title: Banana oat flapjacks
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) porridge oats', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '100g (3.5 oz) sultanas', '225g (8 oz) mashed bananas', '4 tablespoons skimmed milk', '2 egg whites', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
